title: PvP.net constant DC's Still Happening 22/05/2015 9:40
body:
In a Q and also just while in the client even if i've only just logged it in i'm getting constant Disconnect and reconnect from PvP.net.
This has been happening since the Patch before the last recent one and not only to me. I asked in a few games and other have had the same issue.

This is the message I get while in Ranked Champ Select:

You have disconnected from PVP.Net. Attempting to restore your game upon reconnect...
Reconnected to PVP.Net.
You have disconnected from PVP.Net. Attempting to restore your game upon reconnect...
Reconnected to PVP.Net.

Also I cannot see any bans or picks while it's DC'd. If it was just the chat i'd be OK but not being able to pick / ban is not good.

And just now my client has reached "The battle is about to begin" and has frozen in this state for the last 2 mins.

I have tried the repair tool, I have also re-installed the game from scratch and had the small patch for today added on as well. The Problem is still there.

replies.body:
I quit LoL then re-started it to get into that game, the game had started without me and i was 5 mins late getting into it.

But we ended up winning and as usual there were no issues during the game.

After the game tho as soon as i left the stats screen the PvP.net DCs happened again and again.

Logging off for now cause I can't Q for ranked without being able to talk to my teammates or if i have to re-start the game every time just to play.

I suggest you only try custom games until you get this fixed. You don't want to trigger Leaverbuster.

Who's your ISP?

Take a look over [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) and try out everything it suggest. Mainly, I think using another DNS might do it for you. If you need any help with it, just ask.

Best of luck.
